definition: to let go/to cast/to let loose/to discharge/to give expression to
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack
to act like a spoiled child/to throw a tantrum/to act coquettishly
Thatcher (name)/Baroness Thatcher or Margaret Thatcher (1925-2013), British conservative politician, prime minister 1979-1990
to take to one's heels/to scram
to let go of sth/to give up
to pass water/to piss/to urinate/to wee wee
to display shockingly bad behavior/to behave atrociously

sentences.english: In that night was Belshazzar the king of the Chaldeans slain.
sentences.chinese: 當夜，迦勒底王伯沙撒被殺。

sentences.english: In place of Isaac, God provided a ram for Abraham to sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 神爲亞伯拉罕預備了獻祭的公羊，代替以撒。

sentences.english: You're mad because he lied to you.
sentences.chinese: 你因爲他對你撒了個謊就氣得不顧一切了。

sentences.english: Nebuchadnezzar returned to his right mind only after he looked up to heaven.
sentences.chinese: 尼布甲尼撒舉目望天之後才恢復了理智。

sentences.english: If Satan can't defeat us by a frontal attack, he will do it in a more subtle way.
sentences.chinese: 撒但若不能正面攻擊我們，就會改用更巧妙的詭計。

sentences.english: Sprinkling coffee grounds around your garden eliminates cutworms and ants.
sentences.chinese: 將咖啡渣撒在你的花園裏可以消滅夜蛾和螞蟻。

sentences.english: Let us take, for example, Rizzo's discussion of the Good Samaritan problem.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們以裏索討論的好撒瑪利亞人問題爲例。

sentences.english: Jehoahaz rested with his fathers and was buried in Samaria.
sentences.chinese: 約哈斯與他列祖同睡，葬在撒瑪利亞。

sentences.english: Satan rose up against Israel and incited David to take a census of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 撒但起來攻擊以色列人，激動大衛數點他們。

sentences.english: He powdered the cookies with confectioners' sugar.
Many Iraqis said they were happy that Saddam Hussein's rule was over.
sentences.chinese: 許多伊拉克人說他們很高興撒達姆，候賽因政權結束。

sentences.english: I will not have this slave-girl's son sharing the inheritance with my son Isaac.
sentences.chinese: 我不許這女奴的兒子分享我兒以撒的繼承權。

sentences.english: If only Belshazzar had learned to give glory to the true and living God!
sentences.chinese: 如果伯沙撒知道將榮耀歸給那又真又活得神就好了。

sentences.english: The problem is you to this professional forums spread what on?
sentences.chinese: 問題是你來這種專業論壇上撒什麼潑？

sentences.english: Isaac meanwhile had moved on as far as Beer-lahai-roi and was living in the Negeb.
sentences.chinese: 以撒此時已搬到老遠的庇耳拉海萊，住在耐格伯。

sentences.english: I dredged his fish in cornmeal and fried it over the fire.
sentences.chinese: 我在魚上撒了玉米粉，放在篝火上烤。

definition: to mix/to mix in/to toss (a salad)
to pour liquid/to irrigate (using waterwheel)/to water/to cast (molten metal)/to mold
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to smear/to wipe/to erase/classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc
to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary
to skim/lightly touching the water (as the dragonfly in the idiom 蜻蜓點水|蜻蜓点水)/skin-deep
